level.heading: Disposition of fines.
level.text: * ยง 11-4020 Disposition of fines. All fines levied under this chapter shall be paid to the commissioner of finance and deposited in the general fund of the city. * NB Added Ch. 765/85 ยง 82, language juxtaposed per Ch. 907/85 ยง 14 * NB Number supplied by the Legislative Bill Drafting Commission
